functions.tag: {display:{Name:"{\"text\":\"Steady Mace\",\"color\":\"white\",\"italic\":false}",Lore:['{"text":"While essentially a metal club, it can","color":"gray"}','{"text":"smash anything without taking a dent.","color":"gray"}','{"text":"--------","color":"gray"}','{"text":"Damage: 15","color":"gray"}','{"text":"Stamina Cost: 4","color":"gray"}','{"text":"Stamina Regeneration Delay: 1.8s","color":"gray"}','{"text":"+10 Armour Toughness","color":"gray"}','{"text":"+50% Knockback Resistance","color":"gray"}']},Unbreakable:1b,AttributeModifiers:[{AttributeName:"generic.attack_damage",Name:"generic.attack_damage",Amount:14,Operation:0,UUID:[I;1843070327,-960563925,1321153172,-613021264],Slot:"mainhand"},{AttributeName:"generic.attack_speed",Name:"generic.attack_speed",Operation:0,Amount:1020,UUID:[I;-1928568525,-593064597,1793194997,381749572],Slot:"mainhand"},{AttributeName:"generic.armor_toughness",Name:"generic.armor_toughness",Operation:0,Amount:10,UUID:[I;2066170433,149457699,1817498159,522155413],Slot:"mainhand"},{AttributeName:"generic.knockback_resistance",Name:"generic.knockback_resistance",Operation:0,Amount:0.5,UUID:[I;-1536432943,-969112627,-564406245,828753812],Slot:"mainhand"}],HideFlags:6,HoldingID:6}
